name: Dead World (AWondrousExperience)
description:
You wake up.

You have no previous memories except for vague fragments.

Something must be fixed.

It's only logical.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A project for my game design class.

Still much to do. Maybe I'll update the project, or maybe even give it a full rework.

As it stands, Dead World is a text-based action game where you try to figure out what happened to the world around you. You are given stats based off of a questionnaire at the beginning, and gain more via treasures, winning encounters, or certain events. You can shoot guns, have ammo, and traverse random encounters in one of four stages.

Give it a try, tell me what you think.
